quote.msg: 咁寫係唔係有D問題？

replies.msg:
劣改：

In order to avoid contracting Wuhan Coronavirus and its spreading, please report to the estate office immediately if you discover any damage of drainage pipe in your flat.

1. 齋to動機唔夠強烈，所以變in order to
2. minimize the risk又臭又長，直接用avoid就得
3. 個病毒叫武漢肺炎，就算要叫新型肺炎，google都有得查叫novel coronavirus
4. in the community又係多餘，spreading就一定係community架啦
5. 假設睇嘅人係居民，直接用you就得，而且係咪非居民見到條喉壞咗就唔可以講？
6. 重點係條喉有冇壞，唔一定要廁所下話
7. Estate Office我覺得要加the，因為好明確係Lai On嘅Estate Office，唔係泛稱

replies.msg: 明白，唔該晒你

獻醜, 求指正︰
In order to reduce the risk of the spread of the Coronavirus in the community, please contact the estate office by calling xxxxxxxx immediately if any damage of drains or pipes is found.

1. "the risk of the spread of the..."係煩, 係有兩個of, 但係如果又要講risk, 又要講spread, 兩個of係需要；
2. 其實drain已經有pipe的意思, 不過如果要強調, 我覺得drains or pipes也可；
3.我覺得community spread唔得, 因為community不是adj.
To prevent Novel Coronavirus infection and its spread, if you find damaged drains or pipes, please report to the Estate Office immediately.

quote.msg:
獻醜, 求指正︰
In order to reduce the risk of the spread of the Coronavirus in the community, please contact the estate office by calling xxxxxxxx immediately if any damage of drains or pipes is found.

1. "the risk of the spread of the..."係煩, 係有兩個of, 但係如果又要講risk, 又要講spread, 兩個of係需要；
2. 其實drain已經有pipe的意思, 不過如果要強調, 我覺得drains or pipes也可；
3.我覺得community spread唔得, 因為community不是adj.
